resources.string:
Answer all the questions on the following page.

Questions with multiple answers require you select all correct answers to score that question. If you miss an option, the entire question is wrong. Click on SUBMIT when you are done answering all questions. You wont be able to change your answers after submitting. Pass mark is 67% 

 Click "Start" to begin
Q1. Which of these is correct about the number of months in a year?
13 calender months make a leap year
Q2. Which of the following is true of Australia
Q4. Which of these books were not authored by John Grisham
Q5. Which of the following is not a sport
Q6. The word \'laser\' is an acronym for which of these?
Light acceleration by simple emission of radiation
Light amplification by stimulated emission of radiation
The word \'laser\' is not an acronym
